programme.desc: Keep up with everything that's happening in the world of golf. The game's only live, daily news source provides more than just scores, delivering in depth analysis, breaking news, and unforgettable highlights.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to control your ball flight like the best players; learn how to draw the ball on command like Rory McIlroy, hit powerful fades like Scottie Scheffler and rip low stingers down the fairway like Tiger Woods.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach how to improve your accuracy and distance; setup for success like Tommy Fleetwood, improve your swing path like Nelly Korda and learn a drill that helped Morgan Pressel win a Major Championship.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach the most important keys to getting up and down around the green; learn how to setup for success like Phil Mickelson, make solid wedge contact like Luke Donald and control trajectory like Tiger Woods.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach putting grips, styles and drills used by the world's best players; learn how to stop pushing putts like Tiger Woods, eliminate the pull like Scottie Scheffler and put better roll on the ball like Dave Stockton.

programme.title: School of Golf
programme.desc: Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal teach putting grips, styles and drills used by the world's best players; learn how to stop pushing putts like Tiger Woods, eliminate the pull like Scottie Scheffler and put better roll on the ball like Dave Stockton.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: David Leadbetter demonstrates the drills and techniques he taught Nick Faldo before he won six major championships. Leadbetter also reveals how to perfectly grip the club and the technology he trusts when teaching his students.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Todd presents the structure of his teaching, taking Chris all the way from developing a correct motion, to ways to implement on-course pressure into practice.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como is with top adaptive golfer, Brandon Canesi, to find out what can be learned about his one-of-a-kind golf swing.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to Texas and learns the course management strategies Scott Fawcett teaches through a combination of shot distribution patterns and PGA scoring stats. Learn where to aim off the tee and which type of shot to play out of trouble.

programme.title: Swing Expedition With Chris Como
programme.desc: Chris Como travels to Texas and learns the course management strategies Scott Fawcett teaches through a combination of shot distribution patterns and PGA scoring stats. Learn where to aim off the tee and which type of shot to play out of trouble.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches pitching and putting tips to help scramble to more pars and lower scores; learn short game drills used by Tiger Woods, Seve Ballesteros and Jon Rahm.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake uses the best players in the world to answer questions; learn how to fix alignment like Jack Nicklaus, swing with better weight shift like Jon Rahm and improve through impact like Justin Thomas.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches the key shots that helped players become a Masters Champion; learn to control distance with irons like Tiger Woods, shape shots like Hideki Matsuyama and putt on fast greens like Jack Nicklaus.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches a detailed plan to improve practice and take those new skills to the course; learn a practice habit made famous by Tiger Woods and a simple stroke saver used by Rory McIlroy.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches how the arms, shoulders, torso and legs should work for a proper swing sequence; learn drills to stop casting from Xander Schauffele and maximize distance from Rory McIlroy.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches a variety of shots with a variety of clubs to help a player become a short game wizard; Learn the benefits of hitting one-handed pitch shots, how to play the super high flop shot and a short game tip from Jack Nicklaus.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches the key checkpoints in a swing to help crush a driver like Rory.

programme.title: The Golf Fix
programme.desc: Devan Bonebrake teaches how to correct the biggest swing faults caused by poor lower body action.

programme.title: Golf VS
programme.desc: Dallas Stars center Tyler Seguin shares different shots that he uses on the ice, specifically the slapshot.

programme.title: Golf VS
programme.sub-title: Golf Vs Snowboarding: Shaun White Part 1
programme.desc: Olympic gold medalist Shaun White shares how the basics of snowboarding can translate to the golf swing.

programme.title: Golf VS
programme.sub-title: Golf Vs Snowboarding: Shaun White Part 2
programme.desc: Olympic gold medalist Shaun White shares how snowboarding moves like backflips and complex tricks can translate to the golf swing.

programme.title: Golf's Greatest Holes
programme.desc: Former Ryder Cup captain Paul McGinley and Chris Hollins play the most iconic holes on the island of Ireland.

programme.title: Golf's Greatest Holes
programme.desc: Former Ryder Cup captain Paul McGinley and Chris Hollins play the most iconic holes on the island of Ireland.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers want to get the most out of the driver. They demonstrate what the pros look like at impact and share what to do to get into that position.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy Proudman and Piers Ward cover all things long game from fairway metals to hybrids and even how to master the dreaded long irons. They also teach how finding the low point in the swing helps create consistent strikes.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy Proudman and Piers Ward explain the big three in iron play: how to control distance, accuracy, and trajectory on shots. They also show a footwork drill to help ball striking and what to do to work the ball into those tucked pins.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy Proudman and Piers Ward explain how to dial in distances with short irons and how to hit them on line every time; they also explain the bounce angle and how to choose the right amount.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers show how to play a variety of shots around the green, including the high spinning chip, low runner, and many more. They also explain the importance of focusing on a landing zone when hitting greenside shots.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain the necessary fundamentals to hit effective greenside and fairway bunker shots. They also explain how to hit it close from one of the most feared shots in the game, the 30-40-yard bunker shot.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Me and My Golf's Andy and Piers explain how to master judging speed and reads on the greens. They also demonstrate the proper mechanics for hitting it solid and making those clutch putts.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain how to master different lies on the course, featuring the buried lie, sitting up lie, and flyer lie.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain that the best play isn't always the hero shot. They demonstrate how save strokes by hitting over, under, and around trouble.

programme.title: Me and My Golf
programme.desc: Andy and Piers explain how to save strokes by thinking around the course; they'll demonstrate how to take advantage of both sides of the tee-box and the importance of a good pre-shot routine.

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: U.S. Solheim Cup team member Brittany Lincicome welcomes Martin Hall to Tranquilo Golf Club in Orlando, Florida, to discuss all she has to offer to help with putting.

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: Two-time major champion Brittany Lincicome welcomes 2008 PGA Teacher of the Year Martin Hall to discuss how to help with the short game.

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: Two-time major champion Brittany Lincicome welcomes 2008 PGA Teacher of the Year Martin Hall to discuss how to help with the short game.

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: Let legendary golfer Fred Funk teach you how to improve your short game and putting.

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: Padraig Harrington talks how to hit the driver better, farther, and with more accuracy.

programme.title: My Roots: Ernie Els
programme.desc: Follow Ernie's journey from his early years in South Africa, to his climb to world No. 1, his battles with Tiger and the creation of his foundation Els for Autism.

programme.title: My Roots: Bernhard Langer
programme.desc: Bernhard Langer shares his own story in open and honest language, giving golf fans an unprecedented look at his life, losses, and love of the game.
